TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit WebPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class WebPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class WebPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type WebPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制對 HTTP 網際網路資源存取的權限。

span.span: Controls rights to access HTTP Internet resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供一組方法和屬性來控制對網際網路資源的存取。 provides a set of methods and properties to control access to Internet resources. 您可以使用來提供限制或無限制資源的存取權，根據，時，會設定建立。You can use a to provide either restricted or unrestricted access to your resource, based on the that is set when the is created. 建立藉由呼叫其建構函式使用下列其中一個執行個體設定的參數：Create a instance by calling its constructor using one of the following sets of parameters: - 沒有參數。No parameters. 預設的 是 。The default is . - 。A . 指定允許要在目標類別中，使用任何 URI 或允許您使用指定的 Uri 存取方法。Specify either to allow any URI to be used in the target class, or to allow access only to URIs that you specify through the use of the method. - A值和 URI 字串。A value and a URI string. 指定的 URI 已授與權限值。The specified URI has permissions granted by the value. - A規範和 URI 規則運算式。A specifier and URI regular expression. 和保存您已對其授與存取權限的 Uri。The and hold the URIs to which you have granted access permission. 若要將 URI 加入至這些清單中，使用。To add a URI to either of these lists, use . 如果您要傳入為參數，URI 將會加入至。If you pass as the parameter, the URI will be added to the . 將允許所有連線到您的目標類別與 Uri 比對。 will allow connections to your target class with URIs matching the . > [!CAUTION] > 若要拒絕對網際網路資源的存取，則必須拒絕所有可能的路徑，該資源的存取。To deny access to an Internet resource, you must deny access to all the possible paths to that resource. 這需要呼叫狀態參數設為。This requires calling with state parameter set to . 更好的方法是允許特定資源的存取權。A better approach is to allow access to the specific resource only. 如需有關這個主題的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用 Deny 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b4d2e01-c504-4ac3-b50e-d6f5e7f5df25)主題。For more information about this subject, refer to the [NIB: Using the Deny Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b4d2e01-c504-4ac3-b50e-d6f5e7f5df25) topic. > [!NOTE] > 您要拒絕存取使用資源正式路徑。You need to deny access using only the resource canonical path. 沒有需要使用所有路徑的語法變化。There is no need to use all the path's syntactical variations. > [!NOTE] > 使用者名稱和預設連接埠的資訊移除與規則運算式引數提供給在比較之前建構函式。User name and default port information is stripped from the before the comparison with the regular expression argument that is supplied to the constructor. 如果規則運算式包含使用者資訊或預設的連接埠號碼，則所有的連入s 將無法符合規則運算式。If the regular expression contains user information or the default port number, then all incoming s will fail to match the regular expression. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立的新執行個體使用。The following example demonstrates how to create a new instance of using a . 其他主機會加入至連接，並接受清單。Additional hosts are added to the connect and accept list of . 最後，連接並接受清單會顯示到主控台。Finally, the connect and accept list are displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[WebPermission_Regex#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Regex/CPP/regex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermission_Regex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Regex/CS/regex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermission_Regex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Regex/VB/regex.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`state`參數為或分別產生完全限制或完全不受限制地存取安全性的所有變數。The value of the `state` parameter is either or , respectively yielding fully restricted or fully unrestricted access to all security variables. 如果您指定，則您可以提供存取給個別的 Uri 使用。If you specify , then you can give access to individual URIs using . ## Examples 下列範例會建立的執行個體和可提供存取至特定 Url 的權限。The following example creates an instance of and gives access rights to specific URLs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化並且授與它的目標權限，讓遠端主機連接，或接受使用 URI 所描述的遠端主機連接`uriRegex`參數。This constructor initializes a and grants its target permission to either make a remote host connection or accept a remote host connection using the URI described by the `uriRegex` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 建議您建立`uriRegex`使用， ，和旗標。It is recommended that you create `uriRegex` using the , , and flags. > [!NOTE] > 候選 URI 字串會檢查相關的規則運算式的清單進行比對 (或) 有兩種。A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions ( or ) in two ways. 首先，檢查候選 URI 字串符合適當的清單。然後，如果沒有相符項目，候選 URI 字串會轉換成和經過適當的清單。First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a and checked against the appropriate list. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的新執行個體具有所指定的連接權限。The following example creates a new instance of with connect rights for the specified . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您已經指定為，使用來允許使用`uriString`目標類別中。If you have specified as the , use to permit the use of `uriString` in the target class. 採用的方式`uriString`可用目標所指定類別`access`。The way that `uriString` can be used by the target class is specified by `access`. 指定作為存取參數，以加入所指定的 URI`uriString`至的 URI 清單參數接受字串，或指定為存取參數，以將 URI 加入至的 URI 清單連接字串。Specify as the access parameter to add the URI specified by the `uriString` parameter to the list of URI accept strings, or specify as the access parameter to add the URI to the list of URI connect strings. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫上會有任何作用，因為權限會授與所有 Uri。Calling on will have no effect, because permission is granted to all URIs. > [!NOTE] > 候選 URI 字串會檢查相關的規則運算式的清單進行比對 (或) 有兩種。A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions ( or ) in two ways. 首先，檢查候選 URI 字串符合適當的清單。然後，如果沒有相符項目，候選 URI 字串會轉換成和經過適當的清單。First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a and checked against the appropriate list. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何將特定的 URL 字串的存取權限。The following example demonstrates how to add access rights to particular URL strings. [!code-cpp[WebPermission_Intersect#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Intersect/CPP/webpermission_intersect.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebPermission_Intersect#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Intersect/CS/webpermission_intersect.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebPermission_Intersect#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Intersect/VB/webpermission_intersect.vb#2)]
